ingredients.ingredient: 1 large navel orange, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch thick slices
2 large avocados - peeled, pitted, and sliced

cookingTips: Slice avocado just before assembling to maintain green color and prevent oxidation
Use whole-wheat bread that's sturdy enough to hold juicy orange segments and creamy avocado without falling apart
Layer avocado and orange in overlapping patterns for visual appeal and even distribution of flavors
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do you balance the citrus brightness of orange with creamy avocado, and what role does the whole-wheat bread play in structural integrity?
